subject: Nutrition
title: How Much Protein Do You Need
description: A short lesson to help you apply How Much Protein Do You Need.

hook.text: The supplement industry says you need massive protein. Science says most athletes already eat enough.

buildup.text: The RDA of 0.8 grams per kilogram is for sedentary adults. Athletes need 1.2 to 2.0 grams per kilogram.

discovery.text: Beyond 2.0 grams per kilogram, extra protein doesn't build more muscleâ€”it's converted to energy.

twist.text: A 150-pound athlete needs about 110 grams daily. Two chicken breasts and yogurt cover most of it.

climax.text: The protein obsession sells supplements, but whole food sources provide protein plus essential co-nutrients.

punchline.text: Most athletes eat enough protein without any supplements.

quiz.question: How much protein do athletes need per kilogram?
